pages.text: Coleman Public House Restaurant & Tap Room 843-416-8833 427 W. Coleman Blvd Mt. Pleasant, SC 29464 Open Today From 11:30am – 10:00pm Order Online Food Menu Drink Menu Order Online Coleman Public House Our gift cards are perfect for any occasion! Order a gift card online and we will mail it to the recipient. Gift cards are also available for purchase and can be redeemed at both Maybank and Coleman Public House. Purchase Gift Card Reservations Reservations for parties of 5 or more are encouraged. Please contact the restaurant and we will be happy to make the proper accommodations. For smaller parties, we recommend taking advantage of our call-ahead seating option. Simply call the restaurant 15-20 minutes prior to your anticipated arrival time. Our host will be happy to add your name to our wait list in advance in order to reduce your wait time. 427 W. Coleman BlvdMt. Pleasant, SC 29464 colemanpublichouse@gmail.com 843-416-8833 Contact Us Hours Monday Closed Tuesday 11:30am – 10:00pm Wednesday 11:30am – 10:00pm Thursday 11:30am – 10:00pm Friday 11:30am – 11:00pm Saturday 11:30am – 11:00pm Sunday 11:30am – 10:00pm
